  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, TrainingConfig

    public class Pooling1D
extends Subsampling1DLayer
    1D Pooling layer. Supports the following pooling types: MAX, AVG, SUM, PNORM, NONE
    See Also:
